list.title: 1. Visualization development
list.text: We create the design of your logo print and make adjustments.

list.title: 2. Sample production
list.text: After design approval and sample payment, we produce a test pair.

list.title: 3. Sample delivery
list.text: We send it for approval (Nova Poshta, Ukrposhta).

list.title: 4. Final parameters agreement
list.text: We agree on material, quantity, sizes, and production timeline.

list.title: 5. Order payment
list.text: You make a down payment to start production.

list.title: 6. Production launch
list.text: We begin manufacturing the batch of branded socks.

list.title: 7. Individual packaging
list.text: We develop and add labels if needed and package according to your brand.

list.title: 8. Order shipping
list.text: We deliver the finished products in the most convenient way for you.

cards.title: Send your logo or design
cards.text: Submit a request or contact us via social media or messengers. You can also reach us by phone – we'll take care of everything else.

cards.title: Approval and production
cards.text: After final adjustments, you receive a test pair. Upon approval, we start production and deliver the finished batch in the shortest possible time.

cards.title: Development and sample creation
cards.text: Together with you, we'll prepare several unique sock design options and produce test samples.

ourWorks.title: Our Works
ourWorks.text: At Brandyfy, we produce high-quality custom branded socks that become part of your business image. They're perfect as corporate gifts, employee uniform elements, promotional products, or branded merchandise.

list.question: What is the minimum order?
list.answer:
The minimum order is 50 pairs of one model.

Different sizes are available:

Kids sizes:

  • 29-30
  • 30-33
  • 33-35

Women's sizes:

  • 35-37
  • 37-39

Men's sizes:

  • 40-44
  • 43-47

list.question: What is the price?
list.answer:
The price is calculated individually for each design depending on complexity and additional elements.

Prices for classic white or colored socks with a high cuff featuring your print or logo:

High socks:

Cuff height from heel 13-16 cm.

  • from 10 pairs - 160 UAH / pair
  • from 30 pairs - 150 UAH / pair
  • from 50 pairs - 110 UAH / pair
  • from 100 pairs - 80 UAH / pair
  • from 200 pairs - 70 UAH / pair
  • from 300 pairs - 60 UAH / pair
  • from 500 pairs - 50 UAH / pair

Medium socks:

Cuff height from heel 10-13 cm.

  • from 10 pairs - 150 UAH / pair
  • from 30 pairs - 140 UAH / pair
  • from 50 pairs - 105 UAH / pair
  • from 100 pairs - 77 UAH / pair
  • from 200 pairs - 67 UAH / pair
  • from 300 pairs - 57 UAH / pair
  • from 500 pairs - 47 UAH / pair

Short socks:

Cuff height from heel 1-5 cm.

  • from 10 pairs - 140 UAH / pair
  • from 30 pairs - 130 UAH / pair
  • from 50 pairs - 100 UAH / pair
  • from 100 pairs - 70 UAH / pair
  • from 200 pairs - 60 UAH / pair
  • from 300 pairs - 50 UAH / pair
  • from 500 pairs - 40 UAH / pair

list.question: Do you develop visualizations?
list.answer: Yes, when needed. We have a designer who can create visualizations.

list.question: Can I develop my own design and send it to you?
Do you provide a test sample sock to understand how the sock will look?
list.answer: Development of a test sample costs 100-200 UAH (simple design), for complex work - 400-500 UAH. Development time is 1-3 days.

list.question: Do you have designers who can develop a custom label design?
list.answer: Yes. Label design development costs 400-600 UAH depending on complexity and number of variations. You can also design the label yourself.

list.question: Do you produce labels?
list.answer: Yes, we work with printing companies. The approximate cost of a label is 3-7 UAH (labels come in different varieties).

list.question: What additional elements can be added to the socks?
list.answer:
• Compression bands on the foot + 3 UAH/pair
  • Reinforced toe and heel + 3 UAH/pair
  • Moisture-wicking channels + 3 UAH/pair
  • Breathable mesh + 3 UAH/pair
  • Combined cotton with polyester + 8 UAH/pair
  • Terry cloth on heel and toe + 10 UAH/pair
  • Terry cloth on the sole + 13 UAH/pair
  • Fully terry model (inquire for details)
  • Increased cuff height + 5 UAH/pair

list.question: If I reorder, what will be the price per pair? And do I need to pay for a test sample again?
list.answer:
For repeat orders, your price per pair remains fixed if you order the same or smaller quantity. If the number of pairs increases, we can discuss the cost.

No, the test sample is paid for only once.

list.question: How long will I wait for my order?
list.answer:
100 pairs - 3 days from test sample approval.

500 pairs - 7 days from test sample approval.

*Express production is possible. This is discussed individually.

list.question: What is the cooperation process?
list.answer:
• We send samples so you can evaluate the quality of our products.
  • We agree on sock type, material, quantity, and model size.
  • We develop a visualization of your print (logo) and make adjustments.
  • You pay for and we develop a sample, making adjustments until approval.
  • We send the sample to you for approval via Nova Poshta or Ukrposhta.
  • We agree on timeline.
  • You make a down payment.
  • After approval, we begin fulfilling the order.
  • We develop a label design if needed.
  • We package the completed order.
  • Full payment for the order.
  • We ship the socks to you.

list.question: What are the payment terms?
list.answer:
• Payment is made in the amount of 50% or 100% of the order value to the entrepreneur account (prepayment is mandatory)
  • Payment for sample, design development, and label is possible

list.question: In what areas can branded socks be used?
list.answer:
• ✔️ For brands and stores – sell your own unique socks with your logo and design.
  • ✔️ As corporate and holiday gifts – this helps emphasize your company's corporate style or can be used as a gift for employees and clients.
  • ✔️ For sports teams – socks with your team logo not only emphasize your uniqueness but also add confidence and comfort with every step, as they can be designed to meet the needs of each sport.
  • ✔️ Personalized gifts at exhibitions and conferences – personalized or themed socks for special events that help draw additional attention to your brand.

list.question: Why are branded socks an excellent choice for your business?
list.answer:
1. Versatility and practicality
    Socks are a necessary accessory that everyone wears. They are suitable for any audience: employees, clients, partners, or brand fans. They are universal in size, which greatly simplifies the choice.
  2. Effective advertising tool
    Branded socks with a logo or unique design work as "walking advertising." People wear them in everyday life, subconsciously promoting your brand.
  3. Affordable cost
    Unlike t-shirts or hoodies, the production of branded socks is cheaper, but they are no less effective in promoting the company.
  4. Variety of uses
    Socks can be part of a corporate style, merchandise for sale, gifts in advertising campaigns, or souvenirs for loyal customers.
  5. High audience loyalty
    Original branded socks evoke positive emotions and associations with your brand, strengthening customer trust.
  6. Customization for your brand
    You can create a unique design in corporate colors, add slogans, patterns, logos – everything that will make your brand recognizable.
  7. Eco-friendly choice
    Socks made from natural materials correspond to the trend for environmental friendliness and can enhance the positive image of the company.

materials.title: Our Sock Yarn
materials.text: Choose from a wide range of colors and we will create unique socks for you that will brighten your day.

portfolioPage.title: Our Works
portfolioPage.subtitle: Browse examples of our successful orders and create your unique design! We have created and produced over 10,000 trendy sock designs for real clients!
